ygData.subject: RE: Melifluous motion
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate this song.  It tend to want to put you on the lowest area of the zone when you use it which would make it an awful choice for evacing in Unrest because
ygData.messageBody:
I hate this song. It tend to want to put you on the lowest area of the zone
when you use it which would make it an awful choice for evacing in Unrest
because you may use to escape from a train in the second floor only to find
yourself in the basement next to a mortuary fungus and or a ghost.

When you are near water and use it, sometimes it pops on the bottom of the
water - UNDER water. It is ridiculous, I played with it once in Greater
Faydark around Felwithe because I thought that would be a safe area. It is
supposed to have a greater distance with an instrument equipped but I did
not really notice that it did. The only thing I like about it is the sound
it makes when you "pop", in that sense it is good for a nice belly laugh.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 06, 1999 11:06 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Melifluous motion
>
>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> Anyone ever found a use for this song? Moving around in
> Solsek A would be a
> good thing NOT to do with it...:o) Evacing a room in Unrest?
> Anything useful
> at ALL?
>
> Tszaaz
>
